item.title: Archaeology Game
item.description: Digsite Following LD47 I was pretty annoyed at my complete inability to use OpenGL since it caused a lot of wasted hours and on the time limit I didn’t have time to slow down and learn how to use it correctly. So following this I came up with a general idea for a game I want to make in 3D. It feels like a perfect practice ground for OpenGL and a perfect way to struggle my way through 3d game development.
